text: A ceremony for the 151st commemoration of Anagarika Dharmapala was held the other day at Wijaya Vidyalaya, Welimada with the participation of Uva Province Governor M.P. Jayasinghe, and State Minister of Labour and Trade Union Relations Ravindra Samaraweera.Awarding of presents and certificates for students who have won in literary, singing, music and sports competitions held in line with this event in school level was also held at the event. Private Secretary to the Governor, Mrs. K.M.S. Abeysundera, teachers and students of Wijaya Vidyalaya Welimada were also present at the event.
title: Anagarika Dharmapala 151st commemoration - Welimada
